name: Claim Sub Type
description: The sub type of claim that was submitted. See the CARIN IG and specifically this valueset for more information: http://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/ValueSet-C4BBInstitutionalClaimSubType.html

additional: eob.subType.coding[N].display = {corresponding description from valueset specified in .system}
fhirMapping.note: Note that the value of this field is rule-based, and is not stored in the BFD database
